title: WhatsApp and Telegram takes few minutes to load messages..
content:
I keep getting this weird issue when using WiFi connection mostly where Telegram Messages and WhatsApp messages takes some time to recieve my phone. And then when i switch to mobile internet connection i get them the second i switch to mobile connection. I really would appreciate any help you guys can think of because i tried many and nothing worked. I have tried this on other phones and don't get this issue

For WhatsApp: 

I get a notification saying "You may have new messages" i then open WhatsApp and nothing.. then u wait for few minutes and boom new messages appears...
 ..

For Telegram:

I get the message notification but then i open the chat window and it says "connecting..."
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
